title: Blood and Starlight
goal: First direct confrontation between Kaelen and Vane.
stakes_shift: Kaelen learns Vane is his brother.

scenes.summary: Vane's airship, the *Void-Cutter*, rains fire down on the ledge.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen and Lyra are forced to find cover in a shallow cave.

scenes.summary: Vane descends via a gravity-anchor to confront Kaelen personally.
scenes.outcome: The brothers meet for the first time in a decade.

scenes.summary: Kaelen and Vane clash, their blades sparking with star-fire and void-shadow.
scenes.outcome: Vane reveals he didn't break his oath; he evolved it.

scenes.summary: Vane tries to convince Kaelen to join him in 'cleaning' the world.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen rejects Vane, choosing the world's chaos over Vane's order.

scenes.summary: Lyra uses the shard to disrupt Vane's gravity-anchor.
scenes.outcome: The anchor explodes, throwing everyone back.

scenes.summary: The ledge collapses under the stress of the explosion.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen and Lyra plummet into the mist-filled valley.

scenes.summary: Vane watches them fall, certain they cannot survive.
scenes.outcome: Vane turns his attention to the second impact site.

scenes.summary: Kaelen uses his last bit of oath-essence to create a cushioning field.
scenes.outcome: They survive the fall but are severely injured.

scenes.summary: They lose the shard in the dense undergrowth during the landing.
